summary: REQ-2 appears implemented in CafeEnvironment with duplicated seating sets on the right side; REQ-3 cannot be conclusively verified from the truncated BasicCafeRoomFallback diff. The diff also includes several non-requested scene/prop/UI elements in the fallback room.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/advertised fallback-room features unrelated to duplicating seating sets (e.g., very large "Seven Balance" label text and neon green frame glow on the menu board).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly exclude changes beyond duplicating the existing table+chair components; these UI/visual additions are not requested.
evidence: frontend/src/scene/environment/BasicCafeRoomFallback.tsx (header comment mentions large label text and neon green frame glow; imports WallFrameLabel and MenuBoardFrameGlow)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/advertised additional props in the fallback environment (CommercialEspressoMachine and a coffee grinder mesh group on the counter).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is limited to duplicating existing table + wooden chair seating sets; adding other props is not requested.
evidence: frontend/src/scene/environment/BasicCafeRoomFallback.tsx (imports CommercialEspressoMachine; renders <CommercialEspressoMachine .../> and a "Coffee Grinder" mesh group)
